title: 埃及犧牲美軍士兵眾籌

replies.msg:
https://www.gofundme.com/f/support-for-kyle-mckee039s-family-american-soldier


We mourn the terrible loss of the American soldiers who died on Thursday in service of our country as a part of the Multinational Force and Observers (MFO) in Egypt. Our great men and women in uniform put their lives on the line every day for our nation and for the sake of securing peace throughout the world. This fundraiser is for the family of Staff Sgt. Kyle McKee who enlisted in 2003; throughout his career he served tours in Korea, Afghanistan and Iraq and has a long list of accolades from his time in the service. The UH-60 Black Hawk helicopter that Kyle and his fellow soldiers were flying in, crashed over Sinai, Egypt. If you feel compelled, please join us in supporting Kyle's wife, Nikki, sons Jack (11), Canaan (3) as well as his unborn baby girl. Our family is heartbroken and will continue to honor Kyle, who made the ultimate sacrifice for our great nation.

可否幫手盡小小心意
